resources.string:
Kalampoki Quayhouse is one of the best from many culinary spot
 based in suburban city on the east side of Java, Malang,
 Indonesia. In the middle of competitive culinary bussiness, we
 gave you a humblest pleasure of culinary and creativity. Rumour
 said that Kalampoki Quayhouse is a brand new indies corner.
 Whatever it is, a meeting point, creative joint, meals dealer,
 caffeine provider, you name it!
Reading,\nGood for you\nto feed your brain
"In case, if you need to quay\n or may be you wanna ask something, just call us"

Come quay
to
Jl. Bukit Barisan 12, Malang, East Java

/ Open Everyday /
18.00 – 24.00
or just scan this barcode\nfor our line
